name: Greek Mythology Clean UP - A VR Escape Room
name_original: Greek Mythology Clean UP - A VR Escape Room
description:
You come from Olympus to clean up the belongings of King Midas. These have been turned to gold and you must put them in the right boxes according to what they where before if you ever hope to end your work shift. 

--VR HEADSET REQUIRED TO PLAY--
